Careers

Turn your career into your calling

We'll be honest hereâ€”our work is not for the faint-hearted. It's challenging and requires just as much heart as it does muscle.

But the reward is great. Every day, you'll see the impact of your care in the people around you.

We will support you, give you opportunities to grow, and celebrate with you as you enable our residents to live abundantly.

Postions open

If you have a call on your life to serve older Australians, we want to hear from you.

Shared values

We are proud of the workplace culture we have built over our 70 years as an organisation. Our people choose to work with us because their personal values match ours.

Each of us has a heart to serve seniors and help them to live abundantly.

Virtue

Decency | Honesty

Our residents and their families are at the centre of all of our decisions and behaviours.

Acceptance

Forgiveness | Impartiality

Every person is welcome, no matter their denomination or faith.

Love

Compassion | Gentleness

We are inspired by Christ's unconditional love.

Understanding

Empathy | Sensitivity

We view each person as an individual with a unique story, hopes and dreams.

Excellence

Quality | Diligence

We comply with regulations, employ exceptional staff and are always looking for ways to improve.

Serving

Humility | Kindness

We exist to serve our residents, and they are also supported by our volunteer network.

7 reasons to work at Bethany Christian Care

1. We are a large, established Christian organisation.

We have been serving Brisbane seniors for more than 70 years. Across our three locations we have XX staff.

2. We have three accessible locations across Brisbane.

  • The Plains at Eight Mile Plains
  • Janoah Gardens at Manly West
  • Beth Eden at Graceville

3. Our workplace culture resembles family.

Just as we invite our residents to be part of our large family, we'll welcome you, too.

4. Youâ€™ll make a real difference in our residentsâ€™ lives.

Every day you'll see the impact your work has on our residents as you support them to live abundantly.

5. Youâ€™ll build long-term relationships with our residents.

For many of our staff members, their relationships with residents is the best part of working at Bethany Christian Care.

6. We have a wide range of roles within our organisation.

Our organisation needs a wide range of skills and experiences to support our residents: nurses, gardeners, chefs, administration, domestic services and more.

7. Weâ€™ll support you to learn, grow and reach your professional goals.

Your career is your calling and it never stays still. We'll give your opportunities to learn and grow so you can achieve your goals in work and in life.
